overview: In a derelict garage, Darren, a man full of love and rage is caught between the two sides of his personality, the old and the new, the violence and the love, the image and the truth. Playing against the myth of the east end hard man, this short documentary is a Shakespearean tragedy in the real world.
tagline: AWARD WINNING SHORT DOCUMENTARY filmed in a dirty garage in east London.
title: Oil and Water
